00042 TableScanner::TableScanner(PropertiesPtr &props_ptr, Comm *comm,
00043                            TableIdentifier *table_identifier,
00044                            SchemaPtr &schema_ptr,
00045                            RangeLocatorPtr &range_locator_ptr,
00046                            ScanSpec &scan_spec, int timeout)
00047   : m_eos(false), m_scanneri(0), m_rows_seen(0) {
00048 
00049   RowIntervalScannerPtr ri_scanner_ptr;
00050   ScanSpec interval_scan_spec;
00051   Timer timer(timeout);
00052 
00053   if (scan_spec.row_intervals.empty()) {
00054     if (scan_spec.cell_intervals.empty()) {
00055       ri_scanner_ptr = new RowIntervalScanner(props_ptr, comm, table_identifier, schema_ptr, range_locator_ptr, scan_spec, timeout);
00056       m_ri_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner_ptr);
00057     }
00058     else {
00059       for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.cell_intervals.size(); i++) {
00060         scan_spec.base_copy(interval_scan_spec);
00061         interval_scan_spec.cell_intervals.push_back(scan_spec.cell_intervals[i]);
00062         ri_scanner_ptr = new RowIntervalScanner(props_ptr, comm, table_identifier, schema_ptr, range_locator_ptr, interval_scan_spec, timeout);
00063         m_ri_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner_ptr);
00064         ri_scanner_ptr->find_range_and_start_scan(scan_spec.cell_intervals[i].start_row, timer);
00065       }
00066     }
00067   }
00068   else {
00069     for (size_t i=0; i<scan_spec.row_intervals.size(); i++) {
00070       scan_spec.base_copy(interval_scan_spec);
00071       interval_scan_spec.row_intervals.push_back(scan_spec.row_intervals[i]);
00072       ri_scanner_ptr = new RowIntervalScanner(props_ptr, comm, table_identifier, schema_ptr, range_locator_ptr, interval_scan_spec, timeout);
00073       m_ri_scanners.push_back(ri_scanner_ptr);
00074       ri_scanner_ptr->find_range_and_start_scan(scan_spec.row_intervals[i].start, timer);
00075     }
00076   }
00077 
00078 }

00082 bool TableScanner::next(Cell &cell) {
00083 
00084   if (m_eos)
00085     return false;
00086 
00087  try_again:
00088 
00089   if (m_ri_scanners[m_scanneri]->next(cell))
00090     return true;
00091 
00092   m_rows_seen += m_ri_scanners[m_scanneri]->get_rows_seen();
00093 
00094   m_scanneri++;
00095 
00096   if (m_scanneri < m_ri_scanners.size()) {
00097     m_ri_scanners[m_scanneri]->set_rows_seen(m_rows_seen);
00098     goto try_again;
00099   }
00100   
00101   m_eos = true;
00102   return false;
00103 }
